response.original_title: We Spent 24 Hours Locked In Red and Blue Rooms
response.overview: Rhett and Link are trapped in a Red and Blue room and must figure out what the colors mean to their emotions. It seemed like a good idea to be locked in these roomsâ€¦
response.tagline: I am blue, and you are red. Together, we are Rhedd and Bluink
